      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Función poética o estética</string>
            <string language="en">The poetic or aesthetic language function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die poetische oder ästhetische Sprachfunktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fonction-langues poétique ou esthétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A função de língua poética ou aesthetic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La funzione di linguaggio poetic o estetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ποιητική ή αισθητική γλωσσική λειτουργία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Justificar por qué un texto determinado desempeña la función poética o estética del lenguaje.</string>
            <string language="en">Justification of the reason why a text is said to fulfil the poetic or aesthetic function of language.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Poética o estética</string>
            <string language="en">Poetic or aesthetic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Funciones del lenguaje</string>
            <string language="en">Language functions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtfertigung des Grundes, warum ein Text gesagt 
wird, um die poetische oder ästhetische Funktion der Sprache zu 
erfüllen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Justification de la raison pour laquelle on dit 
qu'un texte accomplit la fonction poétique ou esthétique du langage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Justificação da razão porque um texto é dito 
cumprir a função poética ou aesthetic da língua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giustificazione della ragione per la quale un 
testo si dice per compiere la funzione poetic o estetica del 
linguaggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αιτιολόγηση του λόγου για τον οποίο ένα κείμενο 
λέγεται για να εκπληρώσει την ποιητική ή αισθητική λειτουργία 
της γλώσσας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poetisch oder ästhetisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachfunktionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poétique ou esthétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poetic o estetico</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
